page.title: 12School.
page.content: We have a fairly big school.It holds an approximate population of a hundred and seventy children.Quite a few people come from Grendon to the school,but most come from nearby villages,the names of which are, Marsh Gibbon, Twyford,Charndon, Ludgershall and Edgcott.Also, a few people come from the Springhill Prison Estate,just outside the village. We used to have eight classes altogether,but now we only have six. We have an assembly hall,which we also use as a dinner hall.We also have five separate buildings.Two are used for the infants,one is the P.E.store, and one,which used to be a science room,but as we do not use it for science any more it is a classroom once again.
